documentation.description: Allow to shrink an existing index into a new index with fewer primary shards.

index.description: The name of the source index to shrink

target.description: The name of the target index to shrink into

copy_settings.description: whether or not to copy settings from the source index (defaults to false)

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master

deprecated.description: To promote inclusive language, use 'cluster_manager_timeout' instead.

cluster_manager_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to cluster-manager node

wait_for_active_shards.description: Set the number of active shards to wait for on the shrunken index before the operation returns.

wait_for_completion.description: If false, the request will return a task immediately and the operation will run in background. Defaults to true.

task_execution_timeout.description: Explicit task execution timeout, only useful when wait_for_completion is false, defaults to 1h.

body.description: The configuration for the target index (`settings` and `aliases`)
